key_title: Key to the species of Dracophyllum

source.author: Albrecht, D.E.
source.title: Epacridaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: From: Albrecht, D.E. (1996). Epacridaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Inflorescence axis pubescent; peduncle exserted 4–15 cm beyond uppermost persistent leaves; sepals 5, 2.5–3.5 mm long; nectary present; older wood lacking prominent annular scars
Inflorescence axis glabrous, peduncle absent or almost so; sepals 4 or 5, 1.2–1.5 mm long; nectary absent; older wood with prominent annular scars
